channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4997] All sites // Mega Fly-out should move with a higher delay (slower)
item.description:
According to our Sales team, the customers have complained.

please modify the Mega Fly-out so that it moves with a higher delay (slower)
item.summary: All sites // Mega Fly-out should move with a higher delay (slower)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Timeout duration increased from 350 to 550ms
Please test after the next deployment
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5485] Time gap in price definition / Prices are 100 times to high in Movex case
item.description:
There is a time gap in the price definition. E.g. article 14268814 has no price definition between...

  • 12.10.2014 00:00 and 13.10.2014 00:00
  • 14.10.2014 00:00 and 15.10.2014 00:00

During import we have to set the until timestamp to 23:59:59 !

Additionaly the prices are 100 times to high in case of Movex, because Movex is sending the prices in cent but there is no division by 100 in place before importing the price values.
item.summary: Time gap in price definition / Prices are 100 times to high in Movex case

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: @Raphael: I just detected this issue. Is this a bug new since the recent performance refactoring?

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5454] Limit characters of references
item.description: Please set a limitation of 35 characters in customer references in list import tool, shopping list, ...

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5439] Wrong alternative products
item.description:
If you search for item 776095 in the CH shop you get to an alternative item of this product.
On top there is a warning message: "The product Galaxy S4 active I9295 black 16 GB, article number 11056417 is end of life. You may order the successor product below."

For CH/AT and IT should there be written: "The product Galaxy S4 active I9295 black 16 GB, article number 776095 is end of life. You may order the successor product below."

Please add for the 6 digit number there for Movex countries, 8 digit for new SAP countries and the 7 digit for Elfa SAP countries.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hello,
this product Id is part of a global message created in the Back End.
Please reassign
Thanks!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5396] LT // BOM list not importable when just pasted into field
item.description:
Mac OS X 10.9.5
Safari 7.1

user distrelec.testing+lt2@gmail.com, pw distrelec

https://test.distrelec.lt/import-tool

When pasting directly an article list into the import field then the continue button will not be activated, first it have to be clicked into the import field, this will activate the button, this circumstance confuses people like me (= efficiency customer).
item.summary: LT // BOM list not importable when just pasted into field

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Tested today in the Mac and everything fine.
Probably a temporary issue, or cache.
